default: ½ red pepper, stalk intact, seeds removed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the pepper half onto a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Place into the oven and roast for ten minutes. Season with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper.
In a bowl mix together the remaining ingredients and use to stuff the pepper.
Return the pepper to the oven and cook for a further ten minutes and serve.
title: Stuffed pepper
